name: Ext_R2_CarePlan_ac_de_category
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.CarePlan.activity.detail.category for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.activity.detail.category from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: diet | drug | encounter | observation | procedure | supply | other
element.definition: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension` maps to R4B `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `CarePlan.activity.detail.kind` maps to R4B `CarePlan.activity.detail.kind`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: diet | drug | encounter | observation | procedure | supply | other
element.definition: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension` maps to R4B `CarePlan.activity.detail.extension`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `CarePlan.activity.detail.kind` maps to R4B `CarePlan.activity.detail.kind`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.
